attributes.action: Act to save sports clubs from the utility companies surface water increased charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the new method of charging by United Utilities for the removal of surface water from hard standing areas of sports grounds the long term future of sports clubs in jepordy. We like many others clubs provide a valuable community service . We have over two hundred junior members whom we coach but more important help to provide a good start in life for. We are non profit making but are classed by the utiliy companies as a business therefore liable to these exorbitant charges.We feel that sports clubs should be catorgised under a new heading giving them relief from these charges. If we don't get help us like many others will go under and the service we provide will be lost for ever.
